description: Rules for maintaining high code quality standards
content:
# Code Quality Rules

## Code Standards
- Follow style guides
- Write clean code
- Document thoroughly
- Test comprehensively
- Review security

## Testing
- Write tests first
- Cover edge cases
- Include security tests
- Document test cases
- Maintain coverage

## Documentation
- Document code clearly
- Include examples
- Note security considerations
- Update with changes
- Cross-reference

## Review
- Self-review code
- Check security
- Verify tests
- Validate documentation
- Update status
